timeline.message: enable import via fileUpload for monographs

timeline.bodyHTML:
I would suggest to make the configuration parameter optional and interpret a missing parameter as false.

Suggested change
return getCatalog(catalogName).getBoolean("fileUpload");
return getCatalog(catalogName).containsKey("fileUpload")
&& getCatalog(catalogName).getBoolean("fileUpload");
timeline.author: solth

timeline.body:
I think since you handle the uploaded file directly in the `handleFileUpload` listener, this variable here is never used and therefor can be removed.
```suggestion
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I think since you handle the uploaded file directly in the handleFileUpload listener, this variable here is never used and therefor can be removed.

Suggested change
private UploadedFile file;
timeline.author: solth

timeline.body:
Since the `file` variable isn't used, this setter is also not required.
```suggestion
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Since the file variable isn't used, this setter is also not required.

Suggested change
/**
* Set the file.
* @param file the file to upload
*/
public void setFile(UploadedFile file) {
this.file = file;
}
timeline.author: solth

timeline.message:
